Class Index

_global_

AV

Contains all AV API classes and functions.

AV.ACL

An ACL, or Access Control List can be added to any AV.Object to restrict access to only a subset of users of your application.

AV.Cloud

Contains functions for calling and declaring cloud functions.

AV.Cloud.AfterSaveRequest

A Request object that is passed into the afterSave function.

AV.Cloud.AfterUpdateRequest

A Request object that is passed into the afterUpdate function.

AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteRequest

A Request object that is passed into the beforeDelete function.

AV.Cloud.BeforeDeleteResponse

A Response object that is passed to the beforeDelete function.

AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveRequest

A Request object that is passed into the beforeSave function.

AV.Cloud.BeforeSaveResponse

A Response object that is passed to the beforeSave function.

AV.Cloud.FunctionRequest

A Request object that is passed into a cloud function.

AV.Cloud.FunctionResponse

A Response object that is passed to a cloud function.

AV.Collection

Provides a standard collection class for our sets of models, ordered or unordered.

AV.Error

Class used for all objects passed to error callbacks.

AV.Events

AV.Events is a fork of Backbone's Events module, provided for your convenience.

AV.FacebookUtils

Provides a set of utilities for using AV with Facebook.

AV.File

AV.GeoPoint

Represents a latitude / longitude point that may be associated with a key in a AVObject or used as a reference point for geo queries.

AV.History

A fork of Backbone.History, provided for your convenience.

AV.InboxQuery

AV.Object

The fundamental unit of AV data, which implements the Backbone Model interface.

AV.Op

A AV.Op is an atomic operation that can be applied to a field in a AV.Object.

AV.Op.Add

Add is an atomic operation where the given objects will be appended to the array that is stored in this field.

AV.Op.AddUnique

AddUnique is an atomic operation where the given items will be appended to the array that is stored in this field only if they were not already present in the array.

AV.Op.Increment

An Increment is an atomic operation where the numeric value for the field will be increased by a given amount.

AV.Op.Relation

A Relation operation indicates that the field is an instance of AV.Relation, and objects are being added to, or removed from, that relation.

AV.Op.Remove

Remove is an atomic operation where the given objects will be removed from the array that is stored in this field.

AV.Op.Set

A Set operation indicates that either the field was changed using AV.Object.set, or it is a mutable container that was detected as being changed.

AV.Op.Unset

An Unset operation indicates that this field has been deleted from the object.

AV.Promise

AV.Push

AV.Query

AV.Query defines a query that is used to fetch AV.Objects.

AV.Relation

A class that is used to access all of the children of a many-to-many relationship.

AV.Role

A AV.Role is a local representation of a role persisted to the AV cloud.

AV.Router

A fork of Backbone.Router, provided for your convenience.

AV.SearchQuery

AV.SearchSortBuilder

AV.Status

AV.User

A AV.User object is a local representation of a user persisted to the AV cloud.

AV.View

A fork of Backbone.View, provided for your convenience.

avosExpressCookieSession

Express middleware for AV.User session management through a signed browser cookie.

avosExpressHttpsRedirect

Express middleware for redirecting the user to the HTTPS endpoint with the same URL.
